lines.text: Welcome to my kingdom. I will bed you all before the night is through.
It's not how far you go, it's how go you far.
[after [link=tt0080684]]
You have learned much young Dave, but you are not a skier yet.
This isn't a party, it's a still life.
Fitz, you get beer. Ed, you get... beer. Johnny, you get laid.
Skiing is partying, partying is skiing.
We party here.
We party big.
We party now.
Does anyone have a problem with that ?
[pointing to a girl passing in a bikini ]
30 hot-tub ?

[dancing tha lambada with a girl ]
I could dance with you 'till the cows come home... Better still , I could dance with the cows 'till you come home! Oh Christ , I've *come*!
Au revoir mon cherie! One day we will run naked under a fuuulllll mooonnnn!
Anybody got a beer?
[Beer comes flying at him from off screen]

[Pulls down her pantyhose]
See anything?

[Trying to look away]
Yeah, I see lots of things.

[Close up of her undoing her belt, followed by a scene of her pulling down her skirt. She stands by the wall and opens her top to reveal her bra]
Johnny?
Yeah.

[Unhooks her bra and takes it off, revealing her breasts]
Can't you find something?
[He walks over and she pulls him toward her, removing his jacket and his shirt]
God, you're cute.
[Whispers]
What time did you say the party starts?
[He lays her down on the table and they have sex on the table and on a chair]
